site_name: D D FARM ANIMAL SANCTUARY AND RESCUE
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. This was a focused inspection limited to 2.40 (b)(2)
included on the December 19, 2017 inspection report. The animal had been evaluated by a veterinarian. A
treatment plan had been developed and was currently being followed by the licensee. 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee on January 2, 2018.
Additional Inspectors
Osborne Stephanie, Animal Care Inspector
